verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> Many a <S%H7227>time<s%> have they <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H4480>youth,<s%> <S%H5271><s%> may <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> say: <S%H559><s%>
Many a <S%H7227>time<s%> have they <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H4480>youth:<s%> <S%H5271><s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against me.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> he hath cut <S%H7112>asunder<s%> the <S%H5688>cords<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
Let them <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H2682>grass<s%> upon the <S%H1406>housetops,<s%> which <S%H3001>withereth<s%> <S%H7945>before<s%> <S%H6927><s%> it groweth up: <S%H8025><s%>
Wherewith the <S%H7114>mower<s%> <S%H4390>filleth<s%> <S%H7945>not<s%> <S%H3808><s%> his <S%H3709>hand;<s%> nor he that <S%H6014>bindeth<s%> sheaves his <S%H2683>bosom.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> do they which go <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H413>upon<s%> you: we <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
